testsuite.name: pl.futurecollars.invoicing.service.file.FileServiceTest

testcase.name: should throw IllegalStateException if there is problem to write to file
should throw IllegalStateException if there is problem to read from file
should return empty Optional if id not found
should return Optional of line number for existing and unique ID
should return empty Optional for not existing or not unique ID
should throw IllegalStateException if there is problem to update file
should return list of two text lines if fileService write two lines to file
should throw IllegalStateException if founded more than one line with same id
should create file if not exists when rewrite method is used

testsuite.system-out: 2021-08-13 17:50:23.993 ERROR 5020 --- [ Test worker] p.f.invoicing.service.file.FileService : There was problem to write to file: C:\Users\Pawel\AppData\Local\Temp\fileServiceFile11621351251638190183txt 2021-08-13 17:50:24.050 ERROR 5020 --- [ Test worker] p.f.invoicing.service.file.FileService : There was problem to read from file C:\Users\Pawel\AppData\Local\Temp\fileServiceFile8990287198547450414txt 2021-08-13 17:50:24.159 ERROR 5020 --- [ Test worker] p.f.invoicing.service.file.FileService : There is problem to update base file 2021-08-13 17:50:24.196 ERROR 5020 --- [ Test worker] p.f.invoicing.service.file.FileService : Error - There is 2 id's 2 in base.
